LanguageData.Melee_Axe.label: axe
LanguageData.Melee_Axe.description: A useful tool in many situations, including combat. Axe can deal great damage while hits slowly.
LanguageData.Melee_Axe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.Melee_Axe.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.Melee_Ram.label: battering ram
LanguageData.Melee_Ram.description: A large, heavy pillar carried to smash structure. Does less damage to pawns, but effective to buildings.
LanguageData.Melee_Ram.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Melee_Stick.label: stick
LanguageData.Melee_Stick.description: A long stick, with no heavy ends. Stick can't deal great damage, but attacks faster, and also has the ability to support walking.
LanguageData.Melee_Stick.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Melee_Torch.label: torch
LanguageData.Melee_Torch.description: A tool for lighting an area. But why not share your fire with your enemies?
LanguageData.Melee_Torch.tools.stick.label: stick
LanguageData.Melee_Torch.tools.fire-0.label: fire
LanguageData.Melee_Torch.tools.fire-1.label: fire
